plot: A young man has to change a broken electric bulb that serves as a star in the sky. If he doesn't change it the sky will stay dark forever. He struggles through various difficulties to accomplish his task. We'll he be able to do it?
title: ImaGigantes: Las Estrellas
plot_es: A young man has to change a broken electric bulb that serves as a star in the sky. If he doesn't change it the sky will stay dark forever. He struggles through various difficulties to accomplish his task. We'll he be able to do it?
plot_en: A young man has to change a broken electric bulb that serves as a star in the sky. If he doesn't change it the sky will stay dark forever. He struggles through various difficulties to accomplish his task. We'll he be able to do it?
